001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004
005/**
006 * An experimental way of speeding up {@link FastNoise} by using a large buffer of random bytes, and choosing a byte
007 * from the buffer purely by the current seed and position (a simpler calculation than a hash). This currently gives a
008 * modest speed boost to {@link #SIMPLEX}, {@link #PERLIN}, {@link #CUBIC}, and {@link #HONEY}, a smaller speed boost to
009 * {@link #FOAM}, and no change for {@link #VALUE} or {@link #WHITE_NOISE}. This class only uses the least-significant
010 * 20 bits of any seed in most cases; using unique non-negative seeds that are all less than 1000000 is one way to
011 * ensure these bits are different. It should be interchangeable with FastNoise, but be aware that the first time this
012 * class is imported, it will generate about a million random bytes using {@link TangleRNG}. Generating a million bytes
013 * really doesn't take more time than the blink of an eye, but it does use 1MB of RAM for the class (not allocated per
014 * object, at least). 
015 * <br>
016 * This is currently marked as Beta because it's unclear if it can be sped up further, or how that would happen, but if
017 * an opportunity showed itself to accelerate VastNoise and change earlier results, the change would happen.
018 * <br>
019 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 9/12/2020.
020 */
021@Beta
022public class VastNoise extends FastNoise {
023        /**
024         * A constructor that takes no parameters, and uses all default settings with a seed of 1337. An example call to
025         * this would be {@code new VastNoise()}, which makes noise with the seed 1337, a default frequency of 1.0f/32.0f, 1
026         * octave of Simplex noise (since this doesn't specify octave count, it always uses 1 even for the
027         * SIMPLEX_FRACTAL noiseType this uses, but you can call {@link #setFractalOctaves(int)} later to benefit from the
028         * fractal noiseType), and normal lacunarity and gain (when unspecified, they are 2f and 0.5f).
029         */
030        public VastNoise() {
031                super();
032        }
033
034        /**
035         * A constructor that takes only a parameter for the VastNoise's seed, which should produce different results for
036         * any different seeds. An example call to this would be {@code new VastNoise(1337)}, which makes noise with the
037         * seed 1337, a default frequency of 1.0f/32.0f, 1 octave of Simplex noise (since this doesn't specify octave count,
038         * it always uses 1 even for the SIMPLEX_FRACTAL noiseType this uses, but you can call
039         * {@link #setFractalOctaves(int)} later to benefit from the fractal noiseType), and normal lacunarity and gain
040         * (when unspecified, they are 2f and 0.5f).
041         *
042         * @param seed the int seed for the noise, which should significantly affect the produced noise
043         */
044        public VastNoise(int seed) {
045                super(seed);
046        }
047
048        /**
049         * A constructor that takes two parameters to specify the VastNoise from the start. An example call to this
050         * would be {@code new VastNoise(1337, 0.02f)}, which makes noise with the seed 1337, a lower
051         * frequency, 1 octave of Simplex noise (since this doesn't specify octave count, it always uses 1 even for the
052         * SIMPLEX_FRACTAL noiseType this uses, but you can call {@link #setFractalOctaves(int)} later to benefit from the
053         * fractal noiseType), and normal lacunarity and gain (when unspecified, they are 2f and 0.5f).
054         *
055         * @param seed      the int seed for the noise, which should significantly affect the produced noise
056         * @param frequency the multiplier for all dimensions, which is usually fairly small (1.0f/32.0f is the default)
057         */
058        public VastNoise(int seed, float frequency) {
059                super(seed, frequency);
060        }
061
062        /**
063         * A constructor that takes a few parameters to specify the VastNoise from the start. An example call to this
064         * would be {@code new VastNoise(1337, 0.02f, VastNoise.SIMPLEX)}, which makes noise with the seed 1337, a lower
065         * frequency, 1 octave of Simplex noise (since this doesn't specify octave count, it always uses 1 even for
066         * noiseTypes like SIMPLEX_FRACTAL, but using a fractal noiseType can make sense if you call
067         * {@link #setFractalOctaves(int)} later), and normal lacunarity and gain (when unspecified, they are 2f and 0.5f).
068         *
069         * @param seed      the int seed for the noise, which should significantly affect the produced noise
070         * @param frequency the multiplier for all dimensions, which is usually fairly small (1.0f/32.0f is the default)
071         * @param noiseType the noiseType, which should be a constant from this class (see {@link #setNoiseType(int)})
072         */
073        public VastNoise(int seed, float frequency, int noiseType) {
074                super(seed, frequency, noiseType);
075        }
076
077        /**
078         * A constructor that takes several parameters to specify the VastNoise from the start. An example call to this
079         * would be {@code new VastNoise(1337, 0.02f, VastNoise.SIMPLEX_FRACTAL, 4)}, which makes noise with the seed 1337, a lower
080         * frequency, 4 octaves of Simplex noise, and normal lacunarity and gain (when unspecified, they are 2f and 0.5f).
081         *
082         * @param seed      the int seed for the noise, which should significantly affect the produced noise
083         * @param frequency the multiplier for all dimensions, which is usually fairly small (1.0f/32.0f is the default)
084         * @param noiseType the noiseType, which should be a constant from this class (see {@link #setNoiseType(int)})
085         * @param octaves   how many octaves of noise to use when the noiseType is one of the _FRACTAL types
086         */
087        public VastNoise(int seed, float frequency, int noiseType, int octaves) {
088                super(seed, frequency, noiseType, octaves);
089        }
090
091        /**
092         * A constructor that takes a lot of parameters to specify the VastNoise from the start. An example call to this
093         * would be {@code new VastNoise(1337, 0.02f, VastNoise.SIMPLEX_FRACTAL, 4, 0.5f, 2f)}, which makes noise with a
094         * lower frequency, 4 octaves of Simplex noise, and the "inverse" effect on how those octaves work (which makes
095         * the extra added octaves be more significant to the final result and also have a lower frequency, while normally
096         * added octaves have a higher frequency and tend to have a minor effect on the large-scale shape of the noise).
097         *
098         * @param seed       the int seed for the noise, which should significantly affect the produced noise
099         * @param frequency  the multiplier for all dimensions, which is usually fairly small (1.0f/32.0f is the default)
100         * @param noiseType  the noiseType, which should be a constant from this class (see {@link #setNoiseType(int)})
101         * @param octaves    how many octaves of noise to use when the noiseType is one of the _FRACTAL types
102         * @param lacunarity typically 2.0, or 0.5 to change how extra octaves work (inverse mode)
103         * @param gain       typically 0.5, or 2.0 to change how extra octaves work (inverse mode)
104         */
105        public VastNoise(int seed, float frequency, int noiseType, int octaves, float lacunarity, float gain) {
106                super(seed, frequency, noiseType, octaves, lacunarity, gain);
107        }
108
109        /**
110         * Copy constructor; copies all non-temporary fields from  {@code other} into this. This uses the same reference to
111         * an {@link IPointHash} set with {@link #setPointHash(IPointHash)} and to another VastNoise set with
112         * {@link #setCellularNoiseLookup(FastNoise)}, but otherwise everything it copies is a primitive.
113         *
114         * @param other another FastNoise or VastNoise, which must not be null
115         */
116        public VastNoise(FastNoise other) {
117                super(other);
118        }
119        
120        private static final byte[] BUFFER = new byte[0x100000];
121        static {
122                new RNG(new TangleRNG(0x01234567L, 0x89ABCDEFL)).nextBytes(BUFFER);
123        }
124
125        @Override
126        protected int hash32(int x, int y, int z, int s) {
127                return BUFFER[s + (x * 17) + (y * 257) + (z * 4097) & 0xFFFFF] & 31;
128        }
129
130        @Override
131        protected int hash256(int x, int y, int s) {
132                return BUFFER[s + (x * 65) + (y * 4097) & 0xFFFFF] & 255;
133        }
134
135        @Override
136        protected int hash256(int x, int y, int z, int s) {
137                return BUFFER[s + (x * 17) + (y * 257) + (z * 4097) & 0xFFFFF] & 255;
138        }
139
140        @Override
141        protected int hash256(int x, int y, int z, int w, int s) {
142                return BUFFER[s + (x * 17) + (y * 257) + (z * 4097) + (w * 65537) & 0xFFFFF] & 255;
143        }
144
145        @Override
146        protected int hash256(int x, int y, int z, int w, int u, int s) {
147                return BUFFER[s + (x * 9) + (y * 65) + (z * 513) + (w * 4097) + (u * 32769) & 0xFFFFF] & 255;
148        }
149
150        @Override
151        protected int hash256(int x, int y, int z, int w, int u, int v, int s) {
152                return BUFFER[s + (x * 5) + (y * 17) + (z * 65) + (w * 257) + (u * 1025) + (u * 4097) & 0xFFFFF] & 255;
153        }
154        @Override
155        protected float valueNoise (int seed, float x, float y) {
156                int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
157                x -= xFloor;
158                x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
159                int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
160                y -= yFloor;
161                y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
162                return ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, seed))
163                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, seed)))
164                                * 0.003921569f;
165        }
166
167        @Override
168        protected float valueNoise (int seed, float x, float y, float z)
169        {
170                int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
171                x -= xFloor;
172                x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
173                int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
174                y -= yFloor;
175                y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
176                int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
177                z -= zFloor;
178                z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
179                return ((1 - z) *
180                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, seed))
181                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, seed)))
182                                + z *
183                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, seed))
184                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, seed)))
185                ) * 0.003921569f;
186        }
187
188        @Override
189        protected float valueNoise(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w)
190        {
191                int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
192                x -= xFloor;
193                x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
194                int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
195                y -= yFloor;
196                y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
197                int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
198                z -= zFloor;
199                z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
200                int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
201                w -= wFloor;
202                w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
203                return ((1 - w) *
204                                ((1 - z) *
205                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, seed))
206                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, seed)))
207                                                + z *
208                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, seed))
209                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, seed))))
210                                + (w *
211                                ((1 - z) *
212                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, seed))
213                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, seed)))
214                                                + z *
215                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, seed))
216                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, seed)))
217                                ))) * 0.003921569f;
218        }
219        
220        @Override
221        protected float valueNoise(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
222                int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
223                x -= xFloor;
224                x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
225                int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
226                y -= yFloor;
227                y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
228                int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
229                z -= zFloor;
230                z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
231                int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
232                w -= wFloor;
233                w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
234                int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
235                u -= uFloor;
236                u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
237                return ((1 - u) *
238                                ((1 - w) *
239                                                ((1 - z) *
240                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed))
241                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, seed)))
242                                                                + z *
243                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, seed))
244                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, seed))))
245                                                + (w *
246                                                ((1 - z) *
247                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed))
248                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed)))
249                                                                + z *
250                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed))
251                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, seed)))
252                                                )))
253                                + (u *
254                                ((1 - w) *
255                                                ((1 - z) *
256                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed))
257                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed)))
258                                                                + z *
259                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed))
260                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, seed))))
261                                                + (w *
262                                                ((1 - z) *
263                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed))
264                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed)))
265                                                                + z *
266                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed))
267                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, seed)))
268                                                ))))
269                ) * 0.003921569f;
270        }
271        
272        @Override
273        protected float valueNoise(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
274                int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
275                x -= xFloor;
276                x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
277                int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
278                y -= yFloor;
279                y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
280                int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
281                z -= zFloor;
282                z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
283                int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
284                w -= wFloor;
285                w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
286                int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
287                u -= uFloor;
288                u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
289                int vFloor = v >= 0 ? (int) v : (int) v - 1;
290                v -= vFloor;
291                v *= v * (3 - 2 * v);
292                return ((1 - v) *
293                                ((1 - u) *
294                                                ((1 - w) *
295                                                                ((1 - z) *
296                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
297                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
298                                                                                + z *
299                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
300                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor, seed))))
301                                                                + (w *
302                                                                ((1 - z) *
303                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
304                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
305                                                                                + z *
306                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed))
307                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor, seed)))
308                                                                )))
309                                                + (u *
310                                                ((1 - w) *
311                                                                ((1 - z) *
312                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed))
313                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed)))
314                                                                                + z *
315                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed))
316                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed))))
317                                                                + (w *
318                                                                ((1 - z) *
319                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed))
320                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed)))
321                                                                                + z *
322                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed))
323                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor, seed)))
324                                                                )))))
325                                + (v *
326                                ((1 - u) *
327                                                ((1 - w) *
328                                                                ((1 - z) *
329                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed))
330                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed)))
331                                                                                + z *
332                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed))
333                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed))))
334                                                                + (w *
335                                                                ((1 - z) *
336                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed))
337                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed)))
338                                                                                + z *
339                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed))
340                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor, vFloor + 1, seed)))
341                                                                )))
342                                                + (u *
343                                                ((1 - w) *
344                                                                ((1 - z) *
345                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed))
346                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed)))
347                                                                                + z *
348                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed))
349                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed))))
350                                                                + (w *
351                                                                ((1 - z) *
352                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed))
353                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed)))
354                                                                                + z *
355                                                                                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed))
356                                                                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash256(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed) + x * hash256(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1, uFloor + 1, vFloor + 1, seed)))
357                                                                ))))))
358                ) * 0.003921569f;
359        }
